attributes.action: protect the trees over 3.5 mtrs in northern ireland.
attributes.additional_details: everybody says they are environmentally friendly but nobody will do anything to protect the trees.thousands of trees in northern ireland are cut down before applying for planning permission to avoid long delays.only the government can change this.
attributes.background: change the law in northern ireland to protect all trees over 3.5 meters in height.give tree protection back to the dept. of the environment and away from planning depts.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
